description: The Department of National Defense has Temporary Help Services (THS) in the National Capital Region (NCR) procurement requirement. It is restricted to supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 and has been set aside for Indigenous businesses.
full_summary:
================================ }};
## National Capital Region Temporary Help Services Requirement

**Title:** One (1) Special Advisor - Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Reference Number:** cb-502-18777137

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Solicitation Number:** S4862348

**Publication Date:** March 11, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** March 18, 2024, at 11:00:00

**Amendment Date:** March 18, 2024

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal against Supply Arrangement

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

The Department of National Defense invites qualified suppliers to submit a Proposal for Temporary Help Services in the National Capital Region (NCR). The requirement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). To be considered, a pre-qualified supplier must certify that it qualifies as an Indigenous business and will comply with all requirements of PSIB.

**Description of Requirement:**

DND has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from the CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed below.

*   **Level of Security Requirement:** Resource(s) Minimum Security Level Required is/are: Secret
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** *National Capital Region (NCR)*
*   **Regions of Delivery:** *National Capital Region (NCR)*

**Eligible Suppliers:**

The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

*   Accenture Inc.
*   ACOSYS CONSULTING SERVICES INC./ SERVICES CONSEILS ACOSYS INC., THE HALIFAX COMPUTER CONSULTING GROUP INC., in Joint Venture
*   Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
*   Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
*   Confluence Consulting Inc.
*   DBHS Security Consulting Inc
*   Econ Inc.
*   Humaxis Transformation Consulting, Inc.
*   MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
*   NewLeaf Performance Inc.
*   Pleiad Canada Inc.
*   Prologic Systems Ltd.
*   Risk Sciences International Inc.
*   SEASI Consulting Inc.
*   Star-Ting Incorporated

**Contact Information:**

*   Name: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
*   Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces
